body:
Radiance 2007 Scientific Workshop
01-02 (Mon-Tues) October, Digital Technology Center, University of 
Minnesota, Minneapolis, USA.




Dear All,


You can now register and (soon) submit your presentation titles and/or 
abstracts for the 6th annual  Radiance Workshop at
http://www.dtc.umn.edu/cgi-bin/seminars/symposia/radiance.php


Submission deadline is September 12, 2007.


This year's guest speakers will include Susan Ubbelohde (Loisos and 
Ubbelhode Associates),  Roland Fleming (Max Planck Institute for 
Biological Cybernetics), and Greg Ward (Anyhere Software).


The registration fee for the Workshop will be $180. Reduced rates for 
speakers ($140), students ($120), and presenting students ($80) are 
available.


Looking forward to your attendance/contributions!


Katja Doerschner &
Greg Ward


P.S. I will send out a note as soon as the abstract upload feature is ready.


Katja Doerschner
University of Minnesota
Psychology Department
218 Elliott Hall
75 East River Road
Minneapolis, MN 55455-0344
Phone:+1 612 626-8551
http://vision.psych.umn.edu/~doerschner 
<http://vision.psych.umn.edu/%7Edoerschner>
